name: ChirpChirpChirp
description:
Line up birds to make points and keep the gauge from emptying!

Each bird has points on the top left of its card, which will be added up to three times depending on the note. They also have a bonus/malus on the top right corner, which will be applied to the points of the next bird in line.

Your goal is to line up the 5 birds in your hand to rack up as much points as possible, then start over until you can't keep the gauge from reaching 0.

Made in a weekend for Minijam 99.

Credits:

  • Design, Art and Code by Sébastien Gatty, a.k.a. Gatlink
  • Bird sounds: https://freesound.org/people/Lunevix/sounds/581315/
  • Card sounds: https://freesound.org/people/f4ngy/sounds/240776/
  • Color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/island-joy-16
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/fr/bakso-sapi.font
  • Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/m33-project/single/orange-blues
